attributes.action: deliver better services to special needs children in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment are cutting back on special needs the services to get special needs education for children is appauling the statement process is time consumming and the input for these children is poor failing aload of children in education because the support is not available to them goverment want inclusion in to mainstream for these children but are not giving the support or trainning for schools to cope with this and its all about money what about these childrens education they are entilted to this and these children are been failed in society there is a crisis in schools for children with special needs and my child is one of them
